info.name: Fish's Tumblr Dash Tweaks
info.description:
I made this thing years ago after tumblr removed blockquotes, and never really thought to post it. But a friend wanted it, so I figured I should make it available to everyone.

Quick summary of what this does:
- Indicates new additions to posts and grays out inactive blogs.
- Rearranges posts to be more condensed.
- Hides ads and suggestions

I personally use this alongside a pretty basic XKit setup, but it seems to work the same with or without XKit.
info.additionalInfo: What it does: Around your dash: - Hides recommended posts, recommended blogs, tumblr radar, and ad boxes. Inside posts: - Pushes authors' usernames to the right side and removes their avatar icons so that peoples' bad username/icon choices don't mess up your funky flow. - Deactivated blogs' usernames are greyed out instead of having the dumb effect where the "deactivated" text pops up when you hover over it. No more surprises. - If the person reblogging made a new addition, there is a pale blue bar in the margin beside their addition, so you know it's new. - Shrinks margins, meaning less empty space, making those 50-reply posts a little easier to scroll past. - The aforementioned margin thing has the weird side effect of making images a little bigger sometimes, which I actually think is pretty neat. FAQ: Q: Does this block ads? A: Nope, just hides the boxes containing them. If you want to fully block ads, I strongly suggest using uBlock Origin. Q: I want some features but not others! A: I'm not going to make toggles for everything, but I have left nice little comments above each bit of code. If you really hate something, try deleting the lines of code underneath the appropriate comment. Q: This broke something that shouldn't be broken! A: Send me a screenshot on tumblr! I'm babblingfishes there too. Q: Can I edit/repost this code for my own project? A: Yup! As long as you credit me. Changelog: 2020-08-04: Removed a new type of oversized video ad. 2020-04-23: Fixed an issue where the sidebar menu was hidden when managing your own posts. 2020-03-30: Tumblr's updated its theme! So I've hidden blog recs & radar on this one too. I might wait a bit for Tumblr to finalize its new theme before I go in and fix the rest of the tweaks. 2020-02-12: It's new!
